thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: The 10-Point.

author: Gerard Baker
title: The 10-Point.
text:
Good morning,
Target: Tehran
President Trumpâ€™s decision to walk away from the Iranian nuclear accord marks a momentous foreign-policy decision that could have significant consequences and reorder American diplomacy. It represents a giant bet, easily the biggest of his presidency so far. The move threatens to widen the gulf between the U.S. and its allies in the Middle East and Tehran and its backers. Oil firms, plane makers and banks have months to wind down their ties before risking penalties. Any new U.S. sanctions would...
